CPSR annotation resources¶

Basic variant consequence annotation¶

  • VEP v94 - Variant Effect Predictor (GENCODE v28 as gene reference database (v19 for grch37))

Insilico predictions of effect of coding variants¶

  • dBNSFP v3.5 - database of non-synonymous functional predictions (August 2017)

Variant frequency databases¶

  • gnomAD r2 - germline variant frequencies exome-wide (October 2017)
  • dbSNP b151/b150 - database of short genetic variants (October 2017)
  • 1000Genomes phase3 - germline variant frequencies genome-wide (May 2013)
  • Cancer Hotspots - a resource for statistically significant mutations in cancer (2017)

Variant databases of clinical utility¶

  • ClinVar - database of clinically related variants (November 2018)

Protein domains/functional features¶

  • UniProt/SwissProt KnowledgeBase 2018_10 - resource on protein sequence and functional information (November 2018)
  • Pfam v32 - database of protein families and domains (September 2018)

Cancer gene knowledge bases¶

  • CancerMine v6 - Literature-mined database of tumor suppressor genes/proto-oncogenes (November 2018)
    • We require a minimum of three PubMed hits to include candidate oncogenes and TS genes

Phenotype ontologies¶

  • MedGen
